p: LA searches were performed using the search DB tool ( https://www.hiv.lanl.gov/components/sequence/HIV/search/search.html), or the Geography Search Interface ( https://www.hiv.lanl.gov/components/sequence/HIV/geo/geo.comp) with “former USSR” or “Russian federation” as selected regions. Problematic sequences (classified as such in LA; https://www.hiv.lanl.gov/components/sequence/HIV/search/help.html#bad_seq) and entries without annotated subtypes were excluded.
